notes: Increases attack damage by an average of 12%.
The proc chances of multiple crit sources stack. If two sources of critical strike proc at the same time, the higher multiplier has priority.
Does not work against wards, buildings, and allied units.
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 20% chance to deal 160% damage.

description: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
trivia: Before 5.40, Crystalys was named "Crystal Battlegear" and before 5.31, it was named "Crystal Defender".
Crystalis is the titular sword of the 1990 NES game of the same name.
